name: ProntoDoc for Excel Conventional Document
summary: File used by ProntoDoc for Excel (PDE), a Microsoft Excel plug-in used for generating business documents; stores a document template and includes data that was populated from one or more source databases (SQL Server, SharePoint, and Oracle are supported); used for rendering ProntoDoc for Excel templates ( .PDE files) into .XLSX , .PDF and .XPS files; useful in business contexts for automatic report generation.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Microsoft Excel with ProntoDoc for Excel plug-in
